<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

As long as you have _The Tyrant_ invested, you gain a +2 item bonus to [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks made to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53). This bonus increases to +3 if you are at least 17th level.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> envision, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You hold the card up to your lips and exhale onto it; you cast [_dragon form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=88). The level of the spell is half your level, rounded down (minimum 6th level).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
